sentences.sContent: Diplomatic efforts to reach a settlement resume today after a two-week hiatus.
sentences.sCn: 在两周间歇后，为达成解决方案而进行的外交努力于今天重新开始。

remMethod.val: hi (音似： 嗨) + at + us (我们) → 我们见面仅仅说了声“嗨”， 因为我们之间出现了空隙 → 裂缝

trans.tranOther: a space where something is missing, especially in a piece of writing
